author: Sheena McGinley
title: Watch: Emma Stone dancing to Will Butler's 'Anna' will get you set for the Weekend
text:
It's after 7 of a Thursday, if you're not physically willing it to be the weekend already, Emma Stone moving and shaking (on a boat) to Anna is definitely Weekend Eve feeling! Will Butler - of Arcade Fire fame - is that talented, he just knocked this together in his free time - as one does when when you're a musical genius.
The choreography is sublime (according to Entertainment Weekly , it comes courtesy of Ryan Heffington,of Siaâ€™s 'Chandelier' fame), it's old Hollywood glam (think Audrey mixed with Marilyn, and a smattering of Bardot), but with extra swirling and wall stroking as the setting is nautical in nature.
READ: Arcade Fire - The Reflektor Tapes - Movie Review
READ: Irrational Man - Movie Review
